actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consumer Product Safety Act.
short_title: Consumer Product Safety Commission Improvements Act

summary.text: Consumer Product Safety Commission Improvements Act - Abolishes the authority of the Consumer Product Safety Commission under the Consumer Product Safety Act to regulate tobacco and tobacco products, and firearms and ammunition (except for the regulation of fireworks devices).

titles.title: Consumer Product Safety Commission Improvements Act
A bill to amend the Consumer Product Safety Act.
